content: That's really helpful! I'll keep those tips in mind when choosing an essential oil set for my sister. By the way, I've been thinking about my recent purchases and I realized I've been doing pretty well with sales lately. Like that time I got a pair of distressed denim jeans for $20 at H&M, which was originally $60. And who could forget the deal I got on those artisanal soaps at the farmer's market? I got a set of three for $15, which was 20% off the original price.
